Description: Lynn Hill Apartments in Linthicum, Maryland is in the heart of it all, yet nestled in serenity! Come join us and surround yourself with the warm friendly atmosphere of home. Convenient to Glen Burnie, Downtown Baltimore, Annapolis, I-695, Maryland Live Casino and BWI! Come see our impressive floor plans you'll never want to leave!

Description:
(410) 562-3889 - Linthicum Heights Rancher Fenced Yard - Fantastic 3 bedroom Rancher on large fenced lot with Exterior Storage and Patio in a very desirable community in Anne Arundel County. Home is convenient to Baltimore, Columbia, BWI and Ft Meade and beyond. Minimum of one year lease with a multi year lease being desirable.
We work with REALTORS. Your REALTOR can schedule via the MLS by referencing MLS# AA10059334 .
